page.title: 10A VILLAGE SUNDAY
page.content: NINE CHILDREN RISE BETWEEN 09.00 AND 10.45 ;TWO BEFORE 08.00. BREAKFAST CONSISTS OF CEREALS AND TOAST OR FRUIT OR FRUIT JUICE. MILK IS THE FAVOURITE DRINK FOLLOWED BY COFFEE;TEA AND ORANGE JUICE. THREE CHILDREN ATTEND THE METHODIST SUNDAY SCHOOL; NONE ATTEND CHURCH. MOST CHILDREN PLAY AROUND THE VILLAGE;FOUR REGULARLY GO OUT FOR THE DAY BY CAR. THE MAIN SUNDAY MEAL <DINNER> IS TAKEN BETWEEN 12.00 AND 14.00;THIS IS NORMALLY A HOT MEAL.IN THE EVENING NINE CHILDREN WATCH TELEVISION;TWO SELECT THE PROGRAMMES. SIX READ BOOKS BEFORE BEDTIME AND ONE PLAYS GAMES WITH THE FAMILY.ALL DO THEIR HOMEWORK AT SOMETIME DURING THE EVENING. ALL HAVE A BATH OR SHOWER,ALTHOUGH MOST DO THIS EVERY NIGHT.BEDTIME VARIES FROM 20.00 TO 22.30;MOST GO ABOUT 21.00.
